title: Apptronik brings in another $520M to ramp up Apollo production
description:
Apptronik has raised a total of close to $1 billion as it continues developing the Apollo humanoid robot for industrial applications and more.

The post Apptronik brings in another $520M to ramp up Apollo production appeared first on The Robot Report.
content:
